branchCategory.name: PSE540 Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Compact, IP40
branchCategory.description: <p>PSE540 is a remote pressure sensor with a 1 to 5V analog signal output.  This sensor's construction optimizes space savings, for tight, constrained spaces.  The rated pressure range is suitable for a standard pneumatic system.  PSE sensors can measure pressure of any non-corrosive, non-flammable gas.  8 different port options offer tremendous adaptability to various applications.  The cable is molded into the sensor head and is not replaceable.  PSE540 is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure.</p>

breadCrumb.name: PSE540 Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Compact, IP40
